data.text: Good service of hotel. Thank you so much. Next time Will Black again. Reception very good. Restaurant is perfect.  Room very clean. Good view from room. Every morning smile bus driver with reception organize transfer from hotel to beach And from Back.  Thank you so much.
data.title: Travel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear our guest, 
First, we would like to thank you for the praising review you shared following your recent visit to our Riviera hotel and are delighted to read that we were able to match your expectations. 
Looking forward to welcoming you again at RIVIERA HOTEL DUBAI
owner_response.author: WAEL MOSTAFA

data.text: All staff were so kind. And the room was clean, so it was a very comfortable hotel. Also, since there was a Japanese staff here, I was able to ask them any time, which made me feel very safe. That’s why I enjoyed this trip. So I would like to come again. Thank you.
data.title: Best memory

data.text:
Everything was perfect, the staff were extremely kind and helpful. The hotel is at Deira ( the other side of Dubai Creek) but the metro station is close so you can get anywhere with the 2 metro lines.
Room was clean, the bed was comfortable. Nothing negative experience.
data.title: Great hotel at Deira

user_location.name: Debrecen, Hajdu-Bihar County, Northern Great Plain

data.text: This hotel just gets better and better. Stayed here a few times but first time back since covid. And it was great to see the hotel had used the time to remodel and renew a few things. The location is great, the breakfast fabulous and the rooms clean and comfortable. But the best thing about this hotel are the staff. The doormen, receptionists, the restaurant staff and lexi the customer liason wonderful. Professional, hard working and friendly. Nothing is too much trouble. A brilliant team. The welcome is outstanding. Real service. Thankyou for making our time there so lovely and see you all again.
data.title: Wonderful welcome

data.text: I booked a royal suite creek view with Balcony for New Year’s Eve to have good time with my girlfriend and watch the fireworks. They denied us staying at the hotel because we don’t have a marriage certificate, although the laws have changed in the UAE. When I requested a refund they rudely refused. If you book with this hotel you will be loosing your money for nothing.
data.title: Don’t waste your money

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear our Guest, 
First, we would like thank you for your interest in our hotel to stay for the New Year’s Eve, as well we apologize that we couldn't meet your expectations, you have booked our royal suite for a single person but upon check in we had been surprised that you were claiming that the booking is for two persons you and your girlfriend which was not matching with the number of persons for the booked room, our front office team politely and professionally asked you to provide us a marriage proof as per our hotel's policy in order to proceed the check-in process but you have denied this request, that's why we couldn't proceed the check-in or the booking costs refund requested due to your booking non-refundable cancellation policy.
Looking forward to welcoming you again at RIVIERA HOTEL DUBAI
owner_response.author: WAEL MOSTAFA
